description: A basic Android native Kotlin application template using Salesforce Mobile SDK. This template provides a foundation for building Android apps that integrate with Salesforce, featuring basic authentication, REST API integration, and a simple list-based interface.

useCase.primary: Basic Android native app with Salesforce integration
scenarios: Starting point for Salesforce Mobile SDK apps
useCase.when: Use this template when you need to create a basic Android native app that integrates with Salesforce using Kotlin.

extensionPoints.name: App Configuration
extensionPoints.description: Customize the app name, package name, and build configuration
extensionPoints.aiGuidance: Update build.gradle.kts with new package name Modify settings.gradle.kts with new app name Update strings.xml with display name

extensionPoints.name: Salesforce Integration
extensionPoints.description: Add custom Salesforce object queries and REST API calls
extensionPoints.aiGuidance: Modify MainActivity.kt to add custom REST API calls Add SObject queries in MainActivity Update MainApplication.kt for custom SDK configuration

templateVariables.name: projectName
templateVariables.description: The name of the Android project
